details: Errors in the operation of the site
A problem that is not included in any of the proposed services
Granting access to another employee's mailbox

open.author: Tommy Hudson
open.text: I have problems accessing the company's network. I can't connect to the server.

open.text: My computer won't boot, a blue error screen appears.

open.author: Marie Thompson
open.text: There are problems with electricity in the warehouse. Please check and fix the problems.

open.author: Kim Clark
open.text: The generator needs to be repaired in the warehouse. It turns off periodically and does not provide reliable power.

closed.author: Donna Baker
closed.text: There are periodic failures in the operation of the electrical network in the warehouse. This leads to delays in cargo handling. Please take action.

closed.author: Janice Cunningham
closed.text: It is necessary to check and fix the lighting problem in the warehouse. Some of the lights are not working.

motivated_refusals.author: Ashley White
motivated_refusals.text: Please check and fix the air conditioning problems in one of the warehouses. It is too hot there, which may affect the safety of goods.

motivated_refusals.author: Jennifer Dean
motivated_refusals.text: There was a need to install additional sockets in the warehouse to connect additional equipment. Please take action.

motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! We need to arrange transportation of employees to a corporate event in another city. Please provide a comfortable bus for a certain date. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! Please arrange transportation of employees from the airport to our head office building. We ask you to provide comfortable cars. Thanks!

open.author: Esther Black
open.text: Hello! Our shipping belt in the warehouse was damaged. We ask you to arrange its repair and restoration of work. Thanks!

open.author: Willard Bennett
open.text: Good afternoon! We need to carry out maintenance of our fleet. Please arrange for the inspection and repair of all vehicles. Thanks!

closed.author: Bernard Robinson
closed.text: Hello! We are having problems with the operation of the conveyor in the warehouse. I ask you to appoint a specialist for its examination and repair. Thanks!

closed.author: Dorothy Brown
closed.text: Good afternoon! We need to set up and maintain our fleet of loaders. We ask you to arrange the work of a specialist on the specified date. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Angela Alvarez
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! We need to carry out maintenance and configuration of our freight elevator in the warehouse. We ask you to appoint a specialist to perform the work. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Joy Lewis
motivated_refusals.text: Hello! We have a problem with the operation of the lifting crane in the warehouse. Please send a specialist for inspection and repair. It is urgently necessary to restore the operation of the crane. Thanks!
